Class Comment

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.datamodel.Comment
public class Comment extends Object
Represents a comment associated with a shuttle. Provides properties for comment text, shuttle ID, selection state, and comment ID. Includes logging for creation and property access.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty
    selected
    Returns the selection property for this comment.
